name: Balanced Brackets
description: Implement a function that checks if brackets in a string are balanced
specification:
Write a function `is_balanced(s: str) -> bool` that returns True if all brackets (parentheses, square brackets, and curly braces) in the input string are balanced and properly nested, False otherwise.

Examples:
- is_balanced('()') -> True
- is_balanced('()[]{}') -> True
- is_balanced('(]') -> False
- is_balanced('([)]') -> False
- is_balanced('{[]}') -> True
- is_balanced('') -> True
